item.title: A64 Instruction Set
item.description: Load/Store Addressing Addressing mode Base register - w0=[x1] ldr w0, [x1] Offset addressing mode - w0=[x1+12] ldr w0, [x1, 12] Pre-index addressing mode - x1+=12; w0=[x1] ldr w0, [x1, 12]! Post-index addressing mode - w0=[x1]; x1+=12 ldr w0, [x1], 12 Load/store instruction example // load a byte from x1 ldrb w0, [x1] // load a signed byte from x1 ldrsb w0, [x1] // store a 32-bit word to address in x1 str w0, [x1] // load two 32-bit words from stack, then add 8-byte to sp ldp w0, w1, [sp], 8 // store two 64-bit words at [sp-96] and subtract 96-byte from sp.
